languages.text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} grants an ally an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} with full {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}. During the extra turn, there is no attack limit.
Until the end of combat, the Officer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} is halved.
languages.original_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Офицер{/g} предоставляет союзнику {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}дополнительный ход{/g} вместе с полным запасом {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g}. Во время этого хода союзник может совершить неограниченное число атак.
До конца боя {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Общительность{/g} офицера уменьшается вдвое.

traits.locale_text:
- The Leader grants an ally an extra turn with full AP and MP.
- During the extra turn, the ally does not have a limit on attacks.
- Until the end of combat, the Leader's Fellowship is halved.

The Leader grants an ally an extra turn with full AP and MP. During the extra turn, the ally does not have a limit on the number of attacks.
Until the end of combat, the Leader's Fellowship is halved.

The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} grants an ally an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} with full {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}. During the extra turn, there is no attack limit.
Until the end of combat, the Officer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} is halved.

Until the end of combat, the Officer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} is halved.

До конца боя {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Общительность{/g} офицера уменьшается вдвое.

Until the end of combat, the Officer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} is halved.

traits.locale_text:
Лидер предоставляет союзнику дополнительный ход вместе с полным запасом ОД и ОП. Во время этого хода союзник может совершить неограниченное число атак.
До конца боя Общительность командира уменьшается вдвое.

Лидер предоставляет союзнику дополнительный ход вместе с полным запасом ОД и ОП. Во время этого хода союзник может совершить неограниченное число атак.
До конца боя Общительность командира уменьшается вдвое.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}军官{/g}赋予一名盟友一个{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}额外回合{/g}，{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}全部恢复。在此额外回合中，该盟友的攻击次数不受限制。
然而，军官的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}社交{/g}属性减半，效果持续至战斗结束。
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} grants an ally an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} with full {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}. During the extra turn, there is no attack limit.
Until the end of combat, the Officer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} is halved.

traits.locale_text:
领袖赋予一位盟友一个{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}额外回合{/g}，{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}全部恢复。在此额外回合中，该盟友的攻击次数不受限制。
然而，领袖的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}社交{/g}属性减半，效果持续至战斗结束。

{g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}军官{/g}赋予一名盟友一个{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}额外回合{/g}，{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}全部恢复。在此额外{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}中，该盟友的攻击次数不受限制。
然而，军官的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}社交{/g}属性减半，效果持续至战斗结束。

languages.text:
El {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}oficial{/g} otorga a un aliado un {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}turno extra{/g} con todos sus {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g}. Durante este turno extra, no hay límite de ataques.
Hasta el final del combate, la puntuación de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Empatía{/g} del oficial se reduce a la mitad.
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} grants an ally an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} with full {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}. During the extra turn, there is no attack limit.
Until the end of combat, the Officer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} is halved.

traits.locale_text:
El oficial otorga a un aliado un {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}turno extra{/g} con todos sus {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g}. Durante este {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} extra, no existe límite al número de ataques del aliado.
Hasta el final del combate, la puntuación de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Empatía{/g} del oficial se reduce a la mitad.

languages.text:
Der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Offizier{/g} gewährt einem Verbündeten einen {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}Zusatzzug{/g} mit vollen {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g}. Während des {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zusatzzugs{/g} gibt es kein Angriffslimit.
Bis zum Ende des Kampfes wird die {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Gefolgschaft{/g} des Offiziers halbiert.
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} grants an ally an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} with full {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}. During the extra turn, there is no attack limit.
Until the end of combat, the Officer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} is halved.

traits.locale_text:
Der Offizier gewährt einem Verbündeten einen {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}Zusatzzug{/g} mit vollen {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g}. Während des {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zusatzzugs{/g} ignoriert der Verbündete das Limit für die Anzahl der Angriffe.
Bis zum Ende des Kampfes wird die {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Gefolgschaft{/g} des Offiziers halbiert.

languages.text:
L'{g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}officier{/g} confère à un allié un {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}tour supplémentaire{/g} avec le maximum de {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} et de {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g}. Pendant ce tour supplémentaire, aucune limite du nombre maximum d'attaques ne s'applique.
La {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Sociabilité{/g} de l'officier est réduite de moitié jusqu'à la fin du combat.
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} grants an ally an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} with full {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}. During the extra turn, there is no attack limit.
Until the end of combat, the Officer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} is halved.

traits.locale_text:
Le Leader confère à un allié un {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}tour supplémentaire{/g} avec le maximum de {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} et de {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g}. Pendant ce tour supplémentaire, aucune limite ne s'applique au nombre d'attaques de l'allié.
La {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fraternité{/g} du Leader est réduite de moitié jusqu'à la fin du combat.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}士官{/g}が{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}が最大の味方に{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}追加ターン{/g}を与える。追加ターンの間、その味方は攻撃回数の制限がなくなる。
戦闘終了まで、オフィサーの{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}連帯{/g}が半減する。

Until the end of combat, the Officer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} is halved.

戦闘終了まで、オフィサーの{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}連帯{/g}が半減する。

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Subay{/g}, bir dost birime tam {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}EP{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}HP'ye{/g} sahip bir {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}ek tur{/g} kazandırır. Bu ek tur esnasında saldırı sınırı yoktur.
Subay'ın {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Sosyallik{/g} niteliği yarıya iner. Etkisi çatışma sonuna dek sürer.
languages.original_text:

Until the end of combat, the Officer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} is halved.
